original_text: To Enoch was born Irad, and Irad was the father of Mehujael, and Mehujael was the father of Methushael, and Methushael was the father of Lamech.
korean_text: 에녹이 이랏을 낳고 이랏은 므후야엘을 낳고 므후야엘은 므드사엘을 낳고 므드사엘은 라멕을 낳았더라

sentences.original_text: and Irad was the father of Mehujael
and Mehujael was the father of Methushael
and Methushael was the father of Lamech
